title: Infinifactory (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
- Run "setup_infinifactory_2.0.0.2.exe"
- Play
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS! :)
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!

Title: INFINIFACTORY
Genre: Strategy - Building - Puzzle
Works on: Windows (XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10), Mac OS X (10.9.0+) and Linux (Ubuntu 14.04, Mint 17)
Languages: Text only: English
Modes: Single-player
Released: June 30, 2015
Size: 627.8 MB
Company: Zachtronics / Zachtronics
Store page: http://www.gog.com/game/infinifactory

About:
Infinifactory is a sandbox puzzle game by Zachtronics, the creators of SpaceChem and Infiniminer. Build factories that assemble products for your alien overlords, and try not to die in the process.
LIKE SPACECHEMâ€¦ IN 3D! Design and run factories in a first-person, fully 3D environment.
HISTOGRAMS ARE BACK! Optimize your solutions, and then optimize them more when you see how much better your friends did.
VISIT EXOTIC ALIEN LOCALES! Explore a story-driven campaign with 30+ puzzles, audio logs, and more.
BLOCKS THAT MOVE! Go beyond the campaign and push the limits of Infinifactoryâ€™s next-generation block engine in the sandbox.

Minimum system requirements - Windows: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 
Processor: 2.0 GHz 
Memory: 2 GB RAM 
Hard Drive: 1500 MB available space
